t=int(input())
while(t):
 s=input().split()
 m=int(s[0])
 p=float(s[1])
 if(m%2==0):
  r=(1-p**m)/(p+1)
 else:
  r=(1+p**m)/(p+1)
 print(1000000000*r,1000000000*(1-r))
 t-=1

for _ in range(int(input())):
 m, p = map(float, input().split())
 ans = 10**9 * (1 - (-p)**m) / (1 + p)
 print(ans,10**9-ans)

t=int(input())
while(t):
 s=input().split()
 m=int(s[0])
 p=float(s[1])
 if(m%2==0):
  r=(1-p**m)/(p+1)
 else:
  r=(1+p**m)/(p+1)
 print(1000000000*r,1000000000*(1-r))
 t-=1
